dict.string: DRR VIS uses the camera to allow you to take photos for reporting overweight vehicles or road damage that you observe, to submit information to relevant authorities.

DRR VIS uses your location to show the nearest truck weight inspection points and real-time overweight vehicle detection data in your area, such as inspection stations along your regular travel routes.
DRR VIS requires access to your location to send notifications when overweight vehicles are detected nearby and to provide updates on inspection points along routes you frequently use.
DRR VIS uses your location to find and display nearby truck weight inspection stations with real-time statistics of overweight vehicle detection in your area.
DRR VIS uses the microphone for recording audio to accompany reports or capture audio evidence related to traffic law violations.
DRR VIS needs access to your photo library to let you select saved images to attach to incident reports or submit evidence of traffic violations.
